uk.co.saiman.experiment

Interface ExperimentManager


  • public interface ExperimentManager
    API for experiment management, i.e. registration and discovery of experiment types, and registration of root experiment parts such that experiment part trees can be built.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <C,O> ExperimentPart<C,Void,O> addRootExperiment(ExperimentType<C,Void,O> rootType)
      Add a root experiment node of the given type to management.
      Set<ExperimentType<?,Void,?>> getAvailableRootExperimentTypes() 
      Set<ExperimentPart<?,Void,?>> getRootExperiments()
      Get all registered experiment types which can be placed at the root of a tree, i.e.
      boolean registerExperimentType(ExperimentType<?,?,?> childType)
      Register an available experiment type
      List<ExperimentPart<?,?,?>> state()
      Get the current processing state of the experiment manager.
      boolean unregisterExperimentType(ExperimentType<?,?,?> childType)
      Unregister an available experiment type

    • Method Detail

      • state

        List<ExperimentPart<?,?,?>> state()
        Get the current processing state of the experiment manager.
        Returns:
        The current state, in the form of the stack of all currently executing experiment parts

      • getAvailableRootExperimentTypes

        Set<ExperimentType<?,Void,?>> getAvailableRootExperimentTypes()
        Returns:
        All known available root experiment types

      • getRootExperiments

        Set<ExperimentPart<?,Void,?>> getRootExperiments()
        Get all registered experiment types which can be placed at the root of a tree, i.e. those which accept Void as their input.
        Returns:
        All registered root experiment parts

      • addRootExperiment

        <C,O> ExperimentPart<C,Void,O> addRootExperiment(ExperimentType<C,Void,O> rootType)
        Add a root experiment node of the given type to management.
        Parameters:
        rootType - The type of experiment
        Returns:
        A new root experiment part of the given type

      • registerExperimentType

        boolean registerExperimentType(ExperimentType<?,?,?> childType)
        Register an available experiment type
        Parameters:
        childType - A possible experiment type
        Returns:
        True if the type was added successfully, false otherwise

      • unregisterExperimentType

        boolean unregisterExperimentType(ExperimentType<?,?,?> childType)
        Unregister an available experiment type
        Parameters:
        childType - A possible experiment type
        Returns:
        True if the type was removed successfully, false otherwise
